sentences.english: With the chance of Universiade, Shenzhen proposes to build a voluntary city with the effort of all citizens.

sentences.english: It is impossible to construct a resource-saving society without the formation of national notion of saving.
sentences.chinese: 建設資源節約型社會與全民節約觀念的形成密不可分。

sentences.english: Sports activities for the general public were extensively developed, and the level of competitivesportscontinued to improve.
